summary: The HUD-USDA-VA Interagency Coordination Act mandates collaboration between the Departments of Housing and Urban Development, Agriculture, and Veterans Affairs. This includes establishing an interagency agreement to share housing-related research and market data. The bill also requires these agencies to submit a report to relevant congressional committees within 180 days of enactment, detailing opportunities to improve efficiencies in housing programs. This report must be published in the Federal Register for public comment before submission.
